Name.label: Unilateral aplasia of the MÃ¼llerian ducts

TextSection.Contents: A rare, non-syndromic uterovaginal malformation characterized by a crescent-shaped, small-sized uterus containing a single horn and fallopian tube with no rudimentary horn. Urinary tract anomalies are frequently associated.

Synonym.label: Complete unilateral aplasia of the MÃ¼llerian ducts
